remarks: Equality deduction for double sum.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Jan-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
statement:
2sumeq2dv.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ j e. A /\ k e. B ) -> C = D ) $.
2sumeq2dv $p |- ( ph -> sum_ j e. A sum_ k e. B C = sum_ j e. A sum_ k e. B D ) $.
$d A j k $.
$d B k $.
$d j k ph $.
